short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the country name when hovering a flag emoji on facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# what?
Chrome plugin to display country names as a title (toolbox hover) on facebook posts for flag emojis

# Why?
Well, uhm, I'm a member of a facebook group called Grumpy Expat in which people would end up starting almost all posts in the format "ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¬ in ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡± ... " and because I'm (and so many fellow group members are) flag-challenged, I just created this tiny plugin to tell me which flag maps to which country :D (also hence the name)

Flag-emoji mapping is based on gemoji project [https://github.com/github/gemoji]

code can be found at https://github.com/foozee/grumpyFlag
